author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/wc_db.c
(svn_wc__db_temp_forget_directory): Following up on r38892, cleanup code
by using is_ancestor (which includes the node itself) instead of
is_child.

author: hwright
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/merge.c:
Followup to r38896: remove an unused variable.

author: stsp
msg: * subversion/libsvn_subr/config_file.c
(svn_config_ensure): In the default 'servers' configuration file template,
document the 'store-passwords' option more correctly. It does not only
affect passwords cached in the ~/.subversion/auth/ area, but also
passwords stored in external password stores such as GNOME keyring.
Provide an example for disabling all password stores.
Also, remove redundant documentation of the 'store-passwords' and
'store-auth-creds' options from the default 'config' file template,
and point people to the 'servers' file instead.

author: rhuijben
msg: When deleting a newly added wc-directory, make the wc-db forget
about its existance.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c
(mark_tree): When removing a subdirectory from its parents entries,
call svn_wc__adm_access_abspath() on the directory path.

author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c
(erase_from_wc): Revert r37413 and a later update in r38892. This
function should not close/blow away the access baton, as it
contains a write lock. This fixes revert_tests 17 on all operating
systems and introduces a Windows only failure in basic_tests 14, caused
by an open wc.db filehandle.
